sudoku

Class SolverService

  • java.lang.Object
    • sudoku.SolverService

  • public class SolverService
extends java.lang.Object
    Service that runs all solvers each in their own thread. Once one thread finishes, all other threads are killed and the result is returned.

      • SolverService

        public SolverService()

    • Method Detail

      • getFormity

        public static int getFormity(SudokuBoard board)
        Checks if the sudoku is well formed. Instead of picking a general solving strategy, a thread is opened for each strategy and they all test to see if the sudoku is well formed. After the first one returns, the other threads are killed.
        Parameters:
        board - the board to test
        Returns:
        the formity of the board
